titleStmt.title: The vncasing of Machauils instructions to his sonne with the ansvvere to the same.
titleStmt.author: Breton, Nicholas, 1545?-1626?
Machiavelli, Niccolò, 1469-1527, attributed name.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by E. G[riffin] for Richard Higgenbotham, and are to be sold at his shoppe at the signe of the Cardinals Hat without Newgate,

notesStmt.note: Not in fact by Machiavelli, but by Nicholas Breton.
Identified as STC 17171 on UMI microfilm.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
